Question: Shenzhen Betterpower Battery Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Betterpower Battery Co.,Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Lithium battery, Nickel Metal Hydride battery, Nickel Zinc battery, Ni-MH / Li-Ion/ LifePO4 battery pack and outdoor energy storage system
- High safety performance, green and environmental protection, no harmful substances
- Over-charge and over-discharge protection, explosion-proof cover patent
- Daily production capacity of 500,000 nickel-hydrogen batteries and 300,000 lithium-ion batteries
- 21 years of technical team, customizable products, and market-oriented R&D
- 1000W portable power station with 3500 cycle life, fast charging, and multiple safety protections
- Lightweight, compact, and suitable for outdoor use
- Suitable for smartphones, laptops, lamps, speakers, and small appliances
- Suitable for emergency backup and prolonged usage during outdoor activities
- OEM / ODM factory for top international brands
Summary_cn:
深圳贝特能源电池有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点

- 锂电池、镍氢电池、镍锌电池、镍氢/锂离子/磷酸铁锂电池组和户外储能系统
- 高安全性能，环保无害物质
- 过充和过放电保护，防爆盖专利
- 每日产能50万镍氢电池和30万锂离子电池
- 拥有21年技术团队，可定制产品，面向市场的研发
- 1000W便携式电源站，具备3500次循环寿命，快速充电和多重安全保护
- 轻便、紧凑，适合户外使用
- 适用于智能手机、笔记本电脑、灯具、音箱和小型电器
- 适用于紧急备用和户外活动中的长时间使用
- 国际顶级品牌的OEM/ODM工厂
